explanation: Multiple participants express bullish sentiment for BTC, referencing strong support at 107,000 and expectations for upward movement towards liquidation levels (109,700). The trend line is reportedly holding well, and several opinions explicitly mention 'north' (upward) direction. There is discussion of significant buy interest and advice to use stop losses, indicating active trading but overall optimism. The presence of a large 501 BTC sell order at 108,050 is noted, but does not seem to deter the bullish outlook.
representative_opinions: fun: wrong way bitty, you must go north. thats where the love is.
Tiger Eye: Trend line is holding up quite good, if we slip 107 is a strong support
Alexis Gonzalez: 109700 is the last of liquidations above us and with this price action it looks quite possible. I bet we go up at least to liquid levels before we see 103500 again
